doc:
Susan Brown (American actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Susan_Brown_(American_actress) 0 Susan Brown (May 4, 1932 – August 31, 2018) was an American television and film actress and interior designer. She was best known for her roles on daytime soap operas, particularly General Hospital; in 1979, she was nominated for a Daytime Emmy Award for her role on the show. Susan_Brown ( May_4_,_1932 – August_31_,_2018 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actress and interior_designer . She was_best_known for her_roles on daytime_soap_operas , particularly General_Hospital ; in 1979 , she was_nominated for a_Daytime_Emmy_Award for her_role on the_show .
